TCS.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
TCS.description: We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our digital transformation team. You will be responsible for designing and developing scalable web applications using modern technologies. Strong knowledge of React, Node.js, and cloud platforms is required. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions for our global clients.

TCS.title: Data Science Lead
TCS.description: Join our AI/ML Center of Excellence as a Data Science Lead. You will lead a team of data scientists working on cutting-edge machine learning projects. Strong expertise in Python, TensorFlow, and statistical modeling is essential. Experience with big data technologies like Spark and Hadoop is a plus. You will drive innovation and develop AI solutions for Fortune 500 clients.

Infosys.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
Infosys.description: As a Cloud Solutions Architect, you will design and implement enterprise-grade cloud solutions on AWS, Azure, or GCP. You will work with clients to understand their business needs and architect scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure. Strong knowledge of microservices, containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and DevOps practices is required. Certification in at least one major cloud platform is mandatory.

Infosys.title: Cybersecurity Consultant
Infosys.description: We are seeking a Cybersecurity Consultant to join our security practice. You will conduct security assessments, penetration testing, and vulnerability analysis for enterprise clients. Experience with security frameworks like ISO 27001, NIST, and GDPR compliance is essential. You will also be responsible for designing security architectures and implementing security solutions to protect critical business assets.

IBM.title: AI Research Engineer
IBM.description: Join IBM Research Labs as an AI Research Engineer working on next-generation artificial intelligence systems. You will research and develop novel machine learning algorithms, natural language processing models, and computer vision solutions. Strong publication record in top-tier conferences is preferred. You'll collaborate with world-class researchers and contribute to IBM's AI product portfolio including Watson AI.

IBM.title: Blockchain Developer
IBM.description: We are looking for a Blockchain Developer to work on enterprise blockchain solutions using Hyperledger Fabric and IBM Blockchain Platform. You will design and develop smart contracts, build decentralized applications, and implement blockchain-based solutions for supply chain, finance, and healthcare industries. Strong understanding of distributed systems, cryptography, and consensus mechanisms is required.
